comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
The kills are implemented via watching event logs from the map instance servers. Our event logging infrastructure had an outage earlier today (hardware failure), so the kill counts stopped being updated.

I don’t believe there’s a way to recover the lost data, unfortunately.

comments.author: Boss Nomad.6487
comments.body: Kills are updating again but seems like all the kills during the day were not counted at all.

comments.author: Boss Nomad.6487
comments.body:
Kill counts have not updated since 10:30 GMT today.

Everything else seems to be updating.
